name: Super Brain GYM
description:
SSS Brain GYM is coming now!!!

Train your brain here and enhance the ability to solve problems.SSS Brain GYM is an addictive free tricky puzzle game with a series of tricky brain teasers and different riddles testing challenge your mind.

Welcome to play SSS Brain GYM.

Features
● A great game to develop brain skills and IQ
● Addictive and relaxing gameplay
● Easy and simple but humorous game process
● Unexpected game answers
